about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a dedicated team of developers and innovators committed to delivering high-quality digital solutions tailored to your business needs. Our mission is to turn your ideas into reality through technology, creativity, and precision.

items.title: Innovative and Reliable Solutions
items.text: We combine creativity and technical expertise to build solutions that are efficient, secure, and scalable.

items.title: Expert Team with Proven Experience
items.text: Our professionals bring years of experience in web and software development across multiple industries.

items.title: Customer-Centric Approach
items.text: We work closely with our clients to ensure every project meets their goals and exceeds expectations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions about our clinic services and appointments.

q1.question: How can I book an appointment at the clinic?
q1.answer: You can book an appointment online through our website or by calling our reception desk during working hours.

q2.question: Do you accept walk-in patients?
q2.answer: Yes, we accept walk-ins depending on doctor availability, but we recommend booking in advance to avoid waiting.

q3.question: What payment methods are available?
q3.answer: We accept cash, credit/debit cards, and online payments. Insurance billing is also available for partnered providers.

q4.question: Can I reschedule or cancel my appointment?
q4.answer: Yes, you can reschedule or cancel up to 24 hours before your appointment through your account or by contacting us.

q5.question: Do you offer online consultations?
q5.answer: Yes, our doctors provide telemedicine consultations for certain conditions. You can book these through our website.

q6.question: What should I bring for my first visit?
q6.answer: Please bring a valid ID, any previous medical records, and a list of medications you are currently taking.

departments.title: Our Departments
departments.subtitle: Expert care in a variety of medical specialties

cardiology.title: Cardiology
cardiology.intro: Specialized care for heart and blood vessel conditions.
cardiology.description: Our cardiology team offers advanced diagnostics and treatment for heart disease, hypertension, and other cardiovascular issues. We use the latest technology to ensure accurate assessments and effective care.

neurology.title: Neurology
neurology.intro: Comprehensive care for brain and nervous system disorders.
neurology.description: From migraines to complex neurological diseases, our neurologists provide accurate diagnoses and treatment plans tailored to each patient's needs.

hepatology.title: Hepatology
hepatology.intro: Focused on liver health and related conditions.
hepatology.description: We provide advanced care for hepatitis, cirrhosis, fatty liver disease, and other liver disorders, supported by cutting-edge diagnostics.

pediatrics.title: Pediatrics
pediatrics.intro: Caring for your child’s health at every stage.
pediatrics.description: Our pediatric specialists offer compassionate medical care, from newborn checkups to adolescent health, ensuring your child’s well-being and development.

eyeCare.title: Eye Care
eyeCare.description: We offer routine eye exams, corrective procedures, and treatment for eye diseases, using the latest in ophthalmic technology.
